text_block_list.text: The 'Tenno Sho (Spring)'. Mejiro Palmer, Ikuno Dictus, Mejiro McQueen, and Rice Shower were among those expected to shine—
Matikanetannhauser, too, had rumors swirling about her performance in the 'Diamond Stakes', generating high hopes.
As various Umamusume clashed in pursuit of victory, the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)' begins...!
